titleStmt.title: An almanack, and new prognostication, for the year of our Lord, 1700. Being bissextile or leap year; and from the creation of the world, 5649. Exactly calculated for the famous City of Edinburgh, the metropolitan of Scotland, whose latitude is 55d. 54 m. ¹₂ longitude is 11 d. 37 m. / By G. C. Mathemat.
titleStmt.author: G. C.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by the Heirs and Successors of Andrew Anderson, Printer to His most Excellent Majesty, City and Colledge,

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound with some loss of text.
Reproduction of the original in the National Library of Scotland.
